com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenSimpleView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenSimpleView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable.Callback, AccessibilityEventSource, KeyEvent.Callback, SpenSettingViewInterface

    public class SpenSimpleView
extends View
implements SpenSettingViewInterface
    This class provides methods for managing a simple view.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.SpenSettingViewInterface

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenSimpleView

        public SpenSimpleView(Context context,
              int width,
              int height)
        Creates an SpenSimpleView instance.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        width - The view width in pixels.
        height - The view height in pixels.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - If the Context is set null
        OutOfMemoryError - If the width or height are <= 0
        Since:
        3.0.0

        public void close()
        Close the drawing view. Call this method before destroying the instance to prevent memory leaks.

      • onTouchEvent

        public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event)
        Called when a touch event is dispatched to a view.
        Overrides:
        onTouchEvent in class View
        Parameters:
        event - The MotionEvent instance that contains the event information.
        Returns:
        true – if the listener consumed the event. false – if the listener did not consume the event.
        Since:
        3.0.0

        Parameters:

      • captureCurrentView

        public Bitmap captureCurrentView()
        Get the bitmap of the current view.
        Returns:
